text: OpenZaurus is a Debian-based embedded Linux distribution for the Sharp Zaurus personal mobile tool PDA. == Status == On April 26, 2007, it was announced that the OpenZaurus project was over. Future development efforts are to focus on the Ångström distribution for embedded systems. ==Related pages== * Familiar Linux * Palm OS * Pocket PC * Windows Mobile == References == == Other websites == * OpenZaurus project website * Hentges.net OZ with updated OPIE releases Category:Linux distributions Category:Debian-based Linux distributions
title: OpenZaurus
